metadata.name: Facol Classic One 7 08 MG ML Suspension

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: No approved indications Batroxobin is a defibrongenating agent which has been observed to reduce fibrinogen levels and thus reduce clot risk when used intravenously

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Insensitive to thrombin inhibitors and capable of clotting platelet rich plasma without affecting platelet function
